name: uranium-raycast-plugin
author: uranium
title: NFT Primitive Tools
description: Mint, list, manage, Conversion of any media: images, videos, audio, or documents. Permaweb storage.

commands.name: contracts-list
commands.title: View Collections
commands.subtitle: NFT Primitive Tools
commands.description: Browse all of your existing NFT collections.

commands.name: contracts-create
commands.title: Create Collection
commands.subtitle: NFT Primitive Tools
commands.description: Create and deploy a new NFT collection (ERC721 or ERC1155).

commands.name: nfts-list
commands.title: View Assets
commands.subtitle: NFT Primitive Tools
commands.description: Browse, search, and manage all of your NFT assets.

commands.name: nfts-create
commands.title: Mint New Asset
commands.subtitle: NFT Primitive Tools
commands.description: Mint a new NFT from an image, video, audio, or other media file.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your Uranium API key, generate at your account settings: https://portal.uranium.pro/dashboard/profile/api-keys

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
